segments.text: I notice the details in this drawing so clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is focused on her task by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows steadily from the faucet into the full basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over, creating that sheet of water down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's position on the stool catches my eyeâ€” so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is deep in the cookie jar, pulling out a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, her palm out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets are open, dishes neatly stacked nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron on the woman adds a homey touch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, bushes line a peaceful path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how unaware everyone seems to the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between inside and outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a vivid portrayal of everyday life teetering on edge.
segments.speaker: PAR
